For some of our favorite team members, we also copy the ssh keys for them. 

for user in x1kousra x1jhz999 jhf1625 pawetkac x1shukla x1rzb826 snowscan rajhsubr raghk x1nithsa secscan tauxrpt x1vasuna
do
   sudo scp -p /home/${user}/.profile ${targethost}:/home/${user}/.profile
   sudo rsync -avv /home/${user}/.ssh/ ${targethost}:/home/${user}/.ssh/
done
